Sentencas: Nanocrystalline RE2Zr2O7\ (RE = La, Y) ceramics with cubic pyrochlore and defect fluorite structure are prepared through the modified combustion technique.
Titulo: Structural, optical and impedance spectroscopic characterizations of RE2Zr2O7 (RE = La, Y) ceramics

Sentencas: The structure and symmetry of the nanoparticles are investigated using X-ray diffraction and vibrational analysis.
Titulo: Structural, optical and impedance spectroscopic characterizations of RE2Zr2O7 (RE = La, Y) ceramics

Sentencas: The particulate properties investigated through TEM analysis are in good agreement with XRD results.
Titulo: Structural, optical and impedance spectroscopic characterizations of RE2Zr2O7 (RE = La, Y) ceramics

Sentencas: The optical properties are studied using the UV visible and photo luminescent spectroscopy.
Titulo: Structural, optical and impedance spectroscopic characterizations of RE2Zr2O7 (RE = La, Y) ceramics

Sentencas: The prepared samples are sintered by adding 1.6 wt% of ZnO or Ce2O3.
Titulo: Structural, optical and impedance spectroscopic characterizations of RE2Zr2O7 (RE = La, Y) ceramics

Sentencas: The impedance spectroscopic studies show that oxygen vacancies play an important role in ionic conduction of these structures.
Titulo: Structural, optical and impedance spectroscopic characterizations of RE2Zr2O7 (RE = La, Y) ceramics

Sentencas: Number of mobile oxide ions and conductivity are increased by ZnO addition whereas decreased by Ce2O3 addition.
Titulo: Structural, optical and impedance spectroscopic characterizations of RE2Zr2O7 (RE = La, Y) ceramics

Sentencas: The high ionic conductivity values suggest that these materials are useful for electrolytes in intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells (IT-SOFC).
Titulo: Structural, optical and impedance spectroscopic characterizations of RE2Zr2O7 (RE = La, Y) ceramics
